message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. I think it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $175?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a price of $185. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and quality.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I really appreciate it. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly settle on $170 for the product?

Hi Bob, I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $180. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my minimum price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $165 for the product?

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more adjustment. I'm offering the product to you for $175. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Considering the negotiations, could we possibly come to an agreement at $168 for the product?

Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $150, which is my minimum price. This is the best I can do.
